name: Abbey
description: A grand abbey serves as a center of religious power and learning, offering spiritual guidance and political influence, but the religious hierarchy can be both protective and controlling. The combination of faith and politics creates complex social dynamics, while the religious authority can provide protection or create conflict.
atmosphere: Grand stone buildings house extensive libraries and religious artifacts while clergy conduct daily prayers. The air carries incense, ancient parchment, and spiritual authority. Illuminated manuscripts and theological texts line towered libraries. Bell towers call the faithful to worship.
